title: 50/50 Chance of Contradiction
itunes:title: 50/50 Chance of Contradiction
description:
Wednesday 4/26 - Today on the show after rumors spread about Jessie Williams messing with a white actress many were saying he was a hypocrite because he is a black activist, so we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought. Also, Angela gave some advice to some listeners and Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Vamshi Krishan because he lied to keep his side chick.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
